thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au | 3 of 37
thread.title: Bill

author: Bill
title: Bill
text: Recently purchased this car and on test drive felt vibration, a manager who had been using it denied feeling it. A week later I had it in tyre shop they found left rear had delaminated & about to come apart they had tried to keep vibration down by adding a lot of weights to inside of wheel. No consideration for my safety or that of others & whoever did roadworthy should have their licence taken off them .
